about_the_game:
Lights, Camera, ACTION!

Experience the adrenaline-fueled intensity of classic first-person shooter action with AQtion, the ultimate evolution of the beloved mod, Action Quake 2. AQtion combines the latest engine enhancements with the signature gameplay mechanics and updates from the Action Quake community, delivering a nostalgic yet revitalized gaming experience.

Engage in fast-paced, skill-based combat where every move counts. With realistic weapon handling, limited ammunition, and a focus on tactical gameplay, AQtion tests your reflexes and strategic thinking like never before. Master the art of precision shooting, maneuver through dynamic environments, and outsmart your opponents in heart-pounding battles that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

Featuring regularly updated game modes and features, engine enhancements and an active pickup game community, AQtion brings the classic Action Quake 2 experience into the modern era. Jump into the action and unleash your skills in intense multiplayer matches or thrilling single-player challenges.

If you're an old school veteran to first person shooters, this is the Action Quake 2 you remember, with the original charm and modern enhancements you would come to expect. If you're new to the scene, welcome to what classic first person shooters are all about!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 Desktop or higher
  • Processor: x86 1Ghz+ or ARM64 (Rasp Pi)
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB video memory and OpenGL 3 support
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any recent sound card will do
  • Additional Notes: Requires SDL2, libpng and libjpeg
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04 Desktop or higher
  • Processor: x86 2Ghz+ or ARM64 (Rasp Pi)
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB video memory and OpenGL 3 support
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any recent sound card will do
  • Additional Notes: Requires SDL2, libpng and libjpeg

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel or Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM

  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Requires SDL2, libpng and libjpeg, install via brew recommended. See for details

  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 1GHz+
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB video memory and OpenGL 3 support (Intel 3000 Graphics unsupported)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any recent video card or onboard

Recommended:

  • Processor: 2GHz+ Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB video memory with latest OpenGL 3 support
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any recent video card or onboard

reviews:
